name: Dad Reply
tagline: Email replies without the email part.
description: Chrome extension that allows for rapid emoji responses to update emails.

name: Sketch Today
tagline: A collection of modern Sketch resources.
description: Resources to get you started when making the inevitable switch to Sketch.

name: Glyph Palette
tagline: A modern icon plugin for Sketch.
description: Search and add icons from popular icon sets in Sketch.

name: Good Boy
tagline: Get the praise that you crave
description: A figma plugin that periodically adds comments of praise and validation.

name: Solidarity
tagline: Helps you feel less shit about looking for work.
description: Chrome extension that shows everyone is #opentowork.

name: Is Figma down?
description: Site that mimics the Figma status, highlighting the issue with always online.

name: workingon.studio
tagline: This will literally bring you back here.
description: Click it, you'll give me some dopamine for the extra hits.

name: Hidden Current
description: It's not about how much AI is costing you, but how much it's costing us.

name: Design Dojo
description: If you've ever said you were a ninja, it's time to prove it in the dojo.

name: Only 98
description: How much will you spend to be truly unique? Sustainable uniqueness vs wasteful exclusivity.
